Method Detail

replaceWithUpdate

public void replaceWithUpdate()
Description copied from class: ComponentDescription
Replace this component definition with its available update. The object will stay the same but all data will be overwritten with the content of the update. After this method returns, isUpdateAvailable() will return false.

Overrides:
